show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
Today’s show features Russell Bishop, Editor at Large at the Huffington Post and author of Workarounds that Work. We’ll discuss tools and strategies you can use at work to manage change and improve working relationship.
Also the featured health actions for today’s show are acting to protect New York City from a gas pipeline.
For more information, you can go here: http://healthjournalistblog.
com/health-journalist-featured-action-12210/ where you can also sign up for upcoming radio show announcements and activism.
